inputSpec.name: bambais
inputSpec.label: Pairs of sample.bam AND sample.bai files
inputSpec.help: Sample.bam AND sample.bai indexed bam files

inputSpec.name: interval_list
inputSpec.label: Target interval list
inputSpec.help: Interval list sorted in chromosome order, created in the 'GATKgCNV_prep' step

inputSpec.name: annotation_tsv
inputSpec.label: Annotation for the intervals list
inputSpec.help: Contains GC content, mappability and other annotation of target intervals

inputSpec.name: run_name
inputSpec.label: Name of the run
inputSpec.help: Prefix for gCNV.bed and summary files

inputSpec.name: scatter_by_interval_count
inputSpec.label: Split CNV calling into equal subjobs
inputSpec.help: Boolean switch to enable CNV calling to be scattered equally across subjobs in the case of large captures

inputSpec.name: scatter_by_chromosome
inputSpec.label: Split CNV calling into chromosome subjobs
inputSpec.help: Boolean switch to enable CNV calling to be scattered by chromosome across subjobs in the case of large captures

inputSpec.name: scatter_count
inputSpec.label: Number of intervals per scatter job
inputSpec.help: The number of intervals required in each scattered subjob (default: 5000)

inputSpec.name: FilterIntervals_args
inputSpec.label: Optional parameters for FilterIntervals
inputSpec.help: Optional command line arguments for FilterIntervals

inputSpec.name: DetermineGermlineContigPloidy_args
inputSpec.label: Optional parameters for DetermineGermlineContigPloidy
inputSpec.help: Optional command line arguments for DetermineGermlineContigPloidy

inputSpec.name: GermlineCNVCaller_args
inputSpec.label: Optional parameters for GermlineCNVCaller
inputSpec.help: Optional command line arguments for GermlineCNVCaller

inputSpec.name: PostprocessGermlineCNVCalls_args
inputSpec.label: Optional parameters for PostprocessGermlineCNVCalls
inputSpec.help: Optional command line arguments for PostprocessGermlineCNVCalls

inputSpec.name: debug_fail_start
inputSpec.label: Auto-fail the job at the start
inputSpec.help: Automatically fail the job after inputs have been downloaded

inputSpec.name: debug_fail_end
inputSpec.label: Auto-fail the job at the end
inputSpec.help: Automatically fail the job after all commands have finished

inputSpec.name: prior_prob
inputSpec.label: prior probability of ploidy for contigs
inputSpec.help: Probability of the copy number of the chromosomes

outputSpec.name: result_files
outputSpec.label: Sample CNV vcfs, copy ratio files and run-level annotation and visualisation files
